vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Cushites living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.10.7;
son of: Cush (H3568);
brother of: Seba (H5434), Havilah (H2341H), Raamah (H7484), Sabteca (H5455) and Nimrod (H5248); also called Sabta at 1Ch.1.9;
§ Sabta or Sabtah = "striking"
the 3rd son of Cush
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Cus; descendiente de Cam
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒弗他 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "打擊"
古實的第三個兒子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒弗他 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "打击"
古实的第三个儿子
